CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Select which claims-based payments will you pay.
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.sublabel: If you select reductions to beneficiary cost-sharing or other, there will be additional questions to answer.
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.questionTooltip: If reductions to beneficiary cost-sharing or other are selected, there will be additional questions to answer.

options.CARE_MANAGEMENT_HOME_VISITS: Payments for care management home visits
options.SERVICES_NOT_COVERED_THROUGH_TRADITIONAL: Payments for services not covered through Traditional Medicare
options.SNF_CLAIMS_WITHOUT_3DAY_HOSPITAL_ADMISSI: Payments for SNF claims without 3-day hospital admissions
options.TELEHEALTH_SERVICES_NOT_TRADITIONAL_MEDI: Payments for telehealth services not covered through Traditional Medicare

REDUCTIONS_TO_BENEFICIARY_COST_SHARING.label: What is the intended level of beneficiary cost-sharing and how will it be handled?
Will you waive beneficiary cost-sharing (coinsurance and/or deductible) for any services in the model?
REDUCTIONS_TO_BENEFICIARY_COST_SHARING.readonlyLabel: Will you waive beneficiary cost-sharing (coinsurance and/or deductible) for any services in the model? If so, please specify which services.

REDUCTIONS_TO_BENEFICIARY_COST_SHARING.label: Would the waiver only apply for part of the payment?
REDUCTIONS_TO_BENEFICIARY_COST_SHARING.sublabel: For example, we would assess cost-sharing for the service itself, but not for an add-on payment
REDUCTIONS_TO_BENEFICIARY_COST_SHARING.questionTooltip: For example, we would assess cost-sharing for the service itself, but not for an add-on payment

CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Should any model providers be excluded from existing Fee-for-Service payment systems?
Will the model change the Medicare Physician Fee Schedule?
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.sublabel: If so, it might impact Critical Access Hospitals paid under Method II.
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.questionTooltip: If so, it might impact Critical Access Hospitals paid under Method II.

CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Does the model affect Medicare Secondary Payer claims?
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.readonlyLabel: Does the model affect Medicare Secondary Payer claims? How so?

CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: How does the model differ from current policy, especially in terms of payment rates and periodicity of payment?
Will there be payment adjustments (positive or negative) applied?
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.sublabel: Examples: The ESRD Treatment Choices (ETC) model included a payment adjustment known as HDPA for home dialysis payments. Later, CMMI introduced another adjustment, called PPA, which could result in a bonus or penalty for dialysis service payments.
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.questionTooltip: Examples: The ESRD Treatment Choices (ETC) model included a payment adjustment known as HDPA for home dialysis payments. Later, CMMI introduced another adjustment, called PPA, which could result in a bonus or penalty for dialysis service payments.

CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Are you anticipating creating dependencies between services?
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.sublabel: Examples: Service B cannot be paid until Service A has been paid; Service A cannot be paid without Diagnosis 1; If a certain service or diagnosis exists in history, then Service A cannot be paid.
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.questionTooltip: Examples: Service B cannot be paid until Service A has been paid; Service A cannot be paid without Diagnosis 1; If a certain service or diagnosis exists in history, then Service A cannot be paid.

CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Will any additional data need to be collected for claims?
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.sublabel: If you are not sure what current data is collected via provider billing, please ask Provider Billing Group (PBG)
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.questionTooltip: If you are not sure what current data is collected via provider billing, please ask Provider Billing Group (PBG)

CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Will your contractor be providing data (a Third Party File) that will be used in claims processing?
CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.questionTooltip: Make sure your contractor is aware of the Electronic File Transfer process if they’re connected to the Baltimore Data Center (BDC).

CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Is your contractor aware that test data will be needed, and when that test data must be available?

NON_CLAIMS_BASED_PAYMENTS.label: Select which non-claims-based payments will you pay.
